body.p:
No. 157 Henry st.
Brooklyn N. Y.
April 3d 1861
Jas. W. Tate Esq
Ast. Sec. of State, Kentucky.
Dear Sir,
I have the honor to acknowledge the receipt of my Commission, appointing me a Commissioner of Deeds for Kentucky in this State. I send herewith my oath of office, in due form I suppose --
Please acknowledge the receipt of the same that I may know that all is right. and much oblige
